entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
